parameters.notup: not found escalation document, please try again later!
parameters.upok: successful upgrade to the latest version!

diymenu.title: Self-defining Menu
diymenu.memo:
{ Menu Class01|Link Address01 [ ( Menu Class02|Link Address02) ( Menu Class03|Link Address03) ] } Line-breaking is needed when {[]} symbol show up; {}groups can be duplicated.
Menu Class01 | Link Address01 Two columns a name | Link Address02 Name two columns 2 | Link Address03 Menu Class02 | Link Address04 Two columns names 3 | Link Address05 Two columns names 4 | Link Address06 Two columns names 5 | Link Address07
Note: the need to write two columns in front of the blank can be.

manage.title: Manage Center
manage.keywords: Keyword Group (Seperate the keywords using Punctuation Mark of ',' )
manage.lockip: Confined IP Address (Seperate the IPs using Punctuation Mark of ','; Ip section can be locked as well.)
manage.sitemap: Google Sitemap (Please fill-in sitemaps name; leave it blank if you don't need one.)
manage.robot: Web Spiders (Layout:One spider for one line;Spider Name|Code)

create.title: 生成中心
create.keywords: 关键字组 (关键字之间用英文逗号分开)
create.lockip: 限制访问的IP地址 (IP之间用英文逗号分开，可以封锁IP段)
create.sitemap: Google站点地图 (请填写sitemaps文件名称,留空则不生成地图文件)
create.rssnumber: RSS最新列表显示数 (最大值100)
create.mapnumber: Google站点地图列表长度 (最大值50000)
create.robot: 爬虫 (格式:换行分开，爬虫名|包含代码)
create.dirty: 脏话过滤，禁止发言的文字(用英文逗号分开)

plugin.title: Plugin Management
plugin.memo: Plugin(Fillin the plugin directory only and save;using ','to seperate multiple plugins.)

check.notfolder: The specified plugin folder doesn't exist.
check.errorsystem: System folder can't be listed in the plugin.

tip.install: The specified plugin has been installed.
tip.goinstall: A first loading is required before plugin function.
tip.delete: The specified plugin has been deleted.

kingcms.account: Account Management My Account Old Password New Password Leave it blank if no need for modification. Confirm the Password Custom menu (if left unchecked, since the definition of the menu called default) s Incorrect Password Length for Admin Your password is incorrect. The entered 2 passwords doesn't cohere.

check.name: Length of username is between 2-12 characters.

flo.deleteok: The admin account has been deleted.

check.size: Template name too long(50characters including the extension)，please rename the template

error.title: Error!
error.rsnot: Page Under Constructure! Sorry for the inconvenience!
error.lockip:
Sorry!
Your Ip address or Ip section has been lock down due to invalid operation; part of the web service is confined.
error.savefile:
Error at writing files; possible causes are

  • server doesn't support file creating/writing function.
  • server doesn't support folder creating/file attaching function.
error.foldernone: Folder doesn't exist or no right for folder searching.
error.createfolder: Your specified folder can't be created.
error.deletefile: Unexpected error occurred when deleting the file.
error.savetofile: Unexpected error occurred when writing the file.
error.db:
Cannot find database; possible causes are:

  1. Database busy, please try later.
  2. Database error, please contact server management.
  3. Database collapsed, please restore it.

upfile.err0: Uploading failed, your documents beyond the server set up to upload limit
upfile.err1: Uploading failed due to oversized files.
upfile.err2: Uploading failed due to invalid file types.
upfile.err3: Uploading failed due to oversized files, or invalid file types.

error.pp: Your account has been deleted or doen't exist.
error.brow: You going to visit the document has been deleted!
